component.name: GK Healter
component.summary: System health monitor and cleaner designed for Pardus and Debian-based Linux

description.p: GK Healter is a system health monitor and cleaner primarily designed for Pardus and Debian-based Linux distributions. It provides safe and efficient tools for system maintenance, health scoring, and Pardus-specific diagnostics.

ul.li: Pardus Integration: Repository health checks, version analysis, and Pardus-specific diagnostics
APT Environment: Clean package archives, detect broken dependencies, autoremove
System Health: Real-time CPU, RAM, Disk monitoring with health scoring
Intelligent Automation: Schedule maintenance based on idle time or disk usage
AI-Powered Insights: Optional AI analysis of system state via Gemini/OpenAI
Detailed History: Track every cleaning operation and space recovered

screenshot.caption: The main window displaying available cleaning categories and estimated space recovery.

ul.li: Full support for APT and Journald cleaning
Themed GTK 3 interface with dark mode support
